resources.string:
"A set of tasks in a list format.
Lets use HTML formatting to format these texts"
Welcome!\n Routines is an app that will help you establish and solidify life-changing habits.
Understand that they take patience, persistence and commitment.
Don\'t worry, just sit back and we will easy you into it. You are well on your way.
The first step of any successful routine is proper planning. To begin lets create your first and most important task of the day!
"Great! Your first daily task, the most important task, is to plan your day. Let's do a test run. "
We made an oopsy! Try again?
